description: The NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE table contains postoperative occurrence information for NSQIP registry data for the surgeries that are selected for NSQIP submission. It is used in conjunction with NSQIP_INFO table.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: REGISTRY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of registry.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries:

columns.name: CHILD_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name for a child record.

columns.name: CHILD_RECORD_ABBR
columns.description: The abbreviated name for a child record.

columns.name: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the type of postoperative occurrence.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Post-op dialysis


Blood transfusion


Cardiac arrest requiring CPR


Deep incisional SSI


Venous thrombosis requiring therapy


Myocardial infarction


On ventilator > 48 hours


Pneumonia


Pulmonary embolism


Post-op renal insufficiency


Stroke/CVA


Superficial incisional SSI


Sepsis


Unplanned intubation


Urinary tract infection


Wound disruption


Organ/Space SSI


Septic shock


Other (list ICD-9 code)


Other (List ICD-10 code)


C. diff

columns.name: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_PATOS_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the postoperative occurrence was present at the time of surgery.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_TRANS
columns.description: The number of units of red blood cells, whole blood, autologous blood, and cell-saver products transfused postoperatively within the 72 hours of surgery start time.

columns.name: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_DATE
columns.description: The date of postoperative occurrence.

columns.name: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_ICD9
columns.description: The ICD-9 code associated with the postoperative occurrence if the post-op category is Other.

columns.name: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_ICD10
columns.description: The ICD-10 code associated with the postoperative occurrence if the post-op category is Other.

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The type of C. diff test performed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Toxin


DNA


Other-C. diff


Other-non C. diff


None


Unknown

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_RESULT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The result of C. diff test.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Positive


Negative

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_TREATMENT_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient was given treatment for C. diff.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_PATOS_YN

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_DIARRHEA_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the patient with C. diff had diarrhea/loose stools.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_PATOS_YN

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_PAT_HAS_DX_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a patient has a C. diff diagnosis. 'Y' indicates that the patient does have a C. diff diagnosis. 'N' or NULL indicates that the patient does not have a C. diff diagnosis.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_PATOS_YN

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_POSITIVE_TEST_OTHR
columns.description: The user-entered name of other C.diff tests performed that resulted positive for a patient. This column should only be populated if Other [10] is included in the NSQIP_CDIFF_POSITIVE_TEST table for the patient.

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_NEGATIVE_TEST_OTHR
columns.description: The user-entered name of other C.diff tests performed that resulted negative for a patient. This column should only be populated if Other [10] is included in the NSQIP_CDIFF_NEGATIVE_TEST table for the patient.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...) category ID for the registry data record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: NSQIP_CREAT_INCREASE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID corresponding to the most severe level of creatinine increase postoperatively.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


N/A


Increase of greater than or equal 0.3 mg/dl within 48 hours


Increase to 1.5 to less than 2.0 times baseline within 7 days


Increase to 2.0 to less than 3.0 times baseline within 7 days


Increase to greater than or equal 3.0 times baseline within 7 days


Increase of greater than or equal 0.3 mg/dl to greater than or equal 4.0 mg/dl within 48 hours


Increase to greater than or equal 1.5 times baseline to greater than or equal 4.0 mg/dl within 7 days

columns.name: NSQIP_LOW_URINE_OUTPUT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID corresponding to the lowest level of urine output postoperatively.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


N/A


Less than 0.5 ml/kg/h for greater than or equal 6 hours


Less than 0.5 ml/kg/h for greater than or equal 12 hours


Less than 0.3 ml/kg/h for greater than or equal 24 hours


Anuria for greater than or equal 12 hours

columns.name: NSQIP_CDIFF_CONF_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the patient's C. diff colitis lab has been confirmed.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NSQIP_POST_OCCURRENCE_PATOS_YN
